title: Healing Hands Chiropractic - Chiropractor in Herculaneum, MO USA
description: Healing Hands Chiropractic is your local Chiropractor in Herculaneum serving all of your needs. Call us today at 636-479-6700 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Welcome to Healing Hands Chiropractic Your Jefferson County Chiropractor When Only the BEST will do for you and your Family For more information or to schedule an appointment, call 636-479-6700 Drs. Ryan and Charmin Gans are chiropractors serving Jefferson County and the surrounding areas. Whether you need an injury or accident treated, have a specific body problem (such as back pain or a spinal condition), need pain relief, or just want to improve your overall health, Healing Hands Chiropractic may have a solution for you through chiropractic care. You can visit our testimonials page to see how many patients have benefited from seeing these Jefferson County chiropractors and getting regular treatments. At your first visit to Healing Hands Chiropractic, Drs. Ryan and Charmin Gans will explain to you how the science of chiropractic works, and give you a full evaluation to see if chiropractic care is right for you. If there is a good fit, we can develop a plan of chiropractic care that is specific to your condition and health goals. You may be new to seeing a chiropractor and want to find out more. Feel free to click the "email us" link to ask any questions and you are more than welcome to call 636-479-6700 and speak to us directly. We also welcome referrals, so feel free to use the "send to friend" link to share our health information with your friends and loved ones. If you want to receive our free health and wellness articles, you can subscribe to our bi-weekly newsletter, even if you are not a patient. Once you subscribe, you can explore our member wellness section and take advantage of our animated exercise videos, wellness articles, and other resources. "Observational study found that low back pain patients receiving chiropractic care, which typically includes spinal manipulation, are more satisfied than those receiving medical care." -New England Journal of Medicine Drs. Ryan and Charmin Gans Jefferson County Chiropractor | Healing Hands Chiropractic | 636-479-6700 1185 Scenic Drive
